instructions: put the charger on the center bottom of the table cloth
place the dinner fork to the left of the charger with tines pointing towards the top of the table cloth
place the dinner knife to the right of the charger with it's tip pointing to the top of the table cloth
place the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork with tines point to the top of the table cloth
place the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife with it's tip pointing to the top of the table cloth
place the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife, head pointing to the top of the table cloth
place the dessert spoon above the charger, perpendicular to the other utensils, head pointing left
place the dessert fork directly below the dessert spoon, perpendicular to the other utensils, head pointing right
place the bread plate to the left of the dessert spoon
place the butter knife on the bread plate with its tip pointing toward 10 o'clock
place the water glass above the salad knife
place the napkin in the center of the charger
